description:
When Gao forgets an important promise, Bal quits being his Buddy Monster. A mysterious dragon named Abygale takes the runaway Bal under his wing, but Gao suspects that Abygale`s buddy Gaito has been challenging kids to Buddyfight and taking their cards.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: コワァ! ガイトの必殺モンスター!!
